title: Oatmeal, Chocolate Chip and Raisin Cookies
ingredients: ['225g butter, softened', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '200g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '250g porridge oats', '75g plain chocolate chips', '150g raisins', '60g chopped pecans']
